00044 /*
00045  * Read the file contents into the data object.
00046  */
00047 void GridControlFileReader::Read(const std::string &fileName, GridControlData& data)
00048 {
00049         // Clear the old data and read the file.
00050         data.Clear();
00051         GenericFileReader reader;
00052         GenericData gdata;
00053         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00054         reader.ReadHeader(gdata);
00055 
00056         // Check the file identifier
00057         if (gdata.FileIdentifier() != GRD_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER)
00058         {
00059                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException e;
00060                 throw e;
00061         }
00062 
00063         // Get the header parameters.
00064         ParameterNameValueType param;
00065         gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(GRD_ROWS_PARAMETER_NAME, param);
00066         data.SetRows(param.GetValueInt32());
00067         gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(GRD_COLUMNS_PARAMETER_NAME, param);
00068         data.SetColumns(param.GetValueInt32());
00069 
00070         // Get the XY coordinates from the dataSets.
00071         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00072         u_int16_t x;
00073         u_int16_t y;
00074         int nRows;
00075         DataSet *dataSet;
00076 
00077         // First the B1 probes.
00078         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_B1_SET_NAME);
00079         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00080         {
00081                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00082                 throw e;
00083         }
00084         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00085         data.ResizeB1(nRows);
00086         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00087         {
00088                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00089                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00090                 coord.x = x;
00091                 coord.y = y;
00092                 data.SetB1(iRow, coord);
00093         }
00094         dataSet->Close();
00095         dataSet->Delete();
00096 
00097         // Next the B2 probes.
00098         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_B2_SET_NAME);
00099         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00100         {
00101                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00102                 throw e;
00103         }
00104         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00105         data.ResizeB2(nRows);
00106         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00107         {
00108                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00109                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00110                 coord.x = x;
00111                 coord.y = y;
00112                 data.SetB2(iRow, coord);
00113         }
00114         dataSet->Close();
00115         dataSet->Delete();
00116 
00117         // Last the NS probes.
00118         dataSet = gdata.DataSet(GRD_FILE_COORDINATE_GROUP_NAME, GRD_FILE_NS_SET_NAME);
00119         if (dataSet->Open() == false)
00120         {
00121                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00122                 throw e;
00123         }
00124         nRows = dataSet->Rows();
00125         data.ResizeNS(nRows);
00126         for (int iRow=0; iRow<nRows; iRow++)
00127         {
00128                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 0, x);
00129                 dataSet->GetData(iRow, 1, y);
00130                 coord.x = x;
00131                 coord.y = y;
00132                 data.SetNS(iRow, coord);
00133         }
00134         dataSet->Close();
00135         dataSet->Delete();
00136 }
